item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Warner Bros. is selling 1978 ‘Superman’ NFT movie bundles, priced at $30 for the “Standard Edition” or $100 for the “Premium Edition.”
The Superman Web3 Movie Experience is a multimedia NFT that includes the film in 4K Ultra HD format, plus extras.
(https://variety.com/2023/digital/news/superman-nft-web3-movies-bundles-1235632135/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
‘WE LIVE IN TIME’ centers on Almut (Florence Pugh), a witty, unstoppable chef, and Tobias (Andrew Garfield), a recent divorcee, whose surprise encounter changes their lives.
After falling for each other, building a home, and becoming a family, a difficult truth is revealed.
item.author: FilmUpdates
